DataElement.preferredName: Lesion Alteration Pial Tumor Cell Invasion Absent Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of the absence or presence of enhancement of the overlying pia in continuity with enhancing or non-enhancing tumor.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lesion Alteration Pia Mater Tumor Cell Invasion
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: (LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change._A change resulting in something that is different from the original._MRI method that measure the diffusion of water in the tissue, rather than the content of water as measured in conventional MRI._The delicate, highly vascular, innermost membrane encasing the brain and spinal cord._The local spread of tumor cells of a malignant neoplasm through infiltration or destruction of adjacent tissue; for epithelial neoplasms, invasion signifies infiltration beneath the epithelial basement membrane.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.:A change resulting in something that is different from the original.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
The act or process of modifying something.

Property.preferredDefinition: The delicate, highly vascular, innermost membrane encasing the brain and spinal cord.:Local spread of a malignant neoplasm by infiltration or destruction of adjacent tissue; for epithelial neoplasms, invasion signifies infiltration beneath the epithelial basement membrane.

Concepts.definition: The delicate, highly vascular, innermost membrane encasing the brain and spinal cord.

The local spread of tumor cells of a malignant neoplasm through infiltration or destruction of adjacent tissue; for epithelial neoplasms, invasion signifies infiltration beneath the epithelial basement membrane.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of being absent or present.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
